EmailTemplate.name: Important: Opportunity BANT Fields
EmailTemplate.subject: Opportunity BANT Fields are Live in Salesforce!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello Salesforce Users!
**WHAT YOU NEED TO KNOW**
New BANT Fields (Budget, Authority, Need, Timing) are live in Salesforce! Find them in the 'Deal Information' section of the Opportunity page.
These fields will be used by the sales management team to review SAOs for approval to move to 10%.
Please let us know if you have any questions by reaching out to us at salesforce@neo4j.com.
Thank you, Salesforce Team
